page.title: 14HOUSES IN HELSTON
page.content: Many of the houses in Helston have been built in the last twenty years. There are large estates of houses owned and maintained by Kerrier District Council. The most recent of these was completed during 1985. In addition there are housing estates for naval personnel from R.N.A.S. Culdrose. There are also many privately owned houses on small estates. Most of the older houses are situated along the main roads leading into the town. The older type of houses are built of granite but more recent buildings consist of brick, concrete and wood. The most significant development in house building has been the widespread use of double glazing and cavity insulation to conserve heat.
